CIRCULAR  NO.  26 /  2002 
 
 
MHA have informed that M/s Sam Aviation Private Limited has been flying 
cargo aircraft between India and the CIS countries by submitting fake recommendation 
letters of the Embassy of Kazakhstan to MEA and thereby obtaining flight landing 
permission from DGCA for which Jaideep Mirchandani, CMD, Siraj Amani, Executive 
Director and Madhur Michael, Manager (Operations) of the company were arrested on 
18.04.2002. A case F.I.R. No. 02/2002 dated 16.4.2002 was registered u/s 
419/420/468/471/120-B IPC at  PS Special Cell, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi in this regard. 
The case is currently posted in the court of Smt. Sangeeta Dhingra, CMM, Tis Hazari 
Court. 
 
2. 
In view of the above approval of Security Manual in respect of the M/s Sam 
Aviation Ltd given  by this Bureau vide  letter  No.CAS-6(1)/2000/Div-II (SA)   dated 
26.09.2000  is  withdrawn with immediate effect. 
 
3. 
PICs issued to the officials of M/s Sam Aviation Ltd.  are  cancelled with  
immediate  effect.  No  employee of  M/S  Sam Aviation Ltd.  shall be  allowed  to  gain 
entry  into  the airport  on the  strength of PICs  issued   to them  by the Bureau.  PICs  
shall  be  confiscated  by   Airport  Security  staff  /  PIC Committee/ officers  of  BCAS,  
in case  employees of   Sam Aviation  try  to  enter   Airport  on the  strength of  PICs  
issued to them. 
  
This issues with the approval of   Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
(R.K. Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Ref.  NO.CAS-7(29)-/97-Div-1           dated 12.09.2002
